name: Association for the European Citizens' Initiative e.V.
headAddress: Association for the European Citizens' Initiative e.V.
goal: Our organization is primairly working for the successful introduction and implementation of the European Citizens’ Initiative right – the world’s first tool of participatory, transnational and digital democracy. In order to fully exhaust the democratic potential of the ECI and the EU it is important to combine the ECI process with other democratic procedures. We therefore also work on other instruments of citizens participation.
euInitiatives: Legal ECI revision process. We are working for the successful introduction and implementation of the European Citizens’ Initiative right and thus strive for a successful revision process of the ECI regulation.
